children.subject:
Hi anon! Thanks for your reply! :))

Do you know which class(es) corresponds to "theory" part of the requirements?

history.content:
Hi! Is anyone familiar with this program? It says 

Although we do not require applicants to our computer science programs to have a degree in computer science we do expect them to have a strong technical background equivalent to a computer science bachelors degree. Admission to these programs requires experience in programming, algorithms, data structures, and theory at or above the undergraduate level.

I'm an Applied Math major and I have taken/am taking CS 61A, 61B, 189, 170, 188. Would you please tell if I'm somewhat eligible to apply(with Data Science and Systems as my area of concentration)? 

I've emailed the admission office a few times but I've never got a reply so any help would be greatly appreciated!!! :)
history.subject: Master of Engineering class requirements
